name: Vignettes (itch) (Memodol)
description:
Vignettes is a momentum-based platformer inspired by brutalist graphic design.

Features:

  • Gain momentum by sliding downhill, using that momentum to get to
    places you otherwise would not be able to reach
  • Explore an abstract and grotesque world filled with characters and mystery
  • A personal story told indirectly through vignettes
  • Immersive soundscape with dynamic soundtrack

The game explores the dilemma between wanting to express oneself artistically and the demands and pressures of the modern world. Along the way you will “get to know” the creators through exploring and interacting with the characters in this twisted world.
